basics.name: Henrique de Paiva Ribeiro
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced Full Stack Engineer with 7+ years of experience across Angular, Node.js, TypeScript, Java, and Spring Boot. Strong background in Agile/Scrum, micro frontends, RESTful microservices, testing, and CI/CD automation. Hands-on with AWS, GitHub Actions, Docker, and modern CSS tooling. Recognized for clean architecture practices, performance optimization, and mentoring engineers.

work.name: Insight Global (Client: McGraw Hill)
work.summary: Contributing to McGraw Hill’s digital learning platform with Angular micro frontends and Spring Boot microservices in a distributed, multicultural team.
highlights: Built micro‑frontend modules (Angular 17+, Bootstrap 5) end‑to‑end with continuous UI/UX improvements
Designed and maintained Java microservices (Spring Boot 3) exposing RESTful APIs for high‑volume traffic
Applied SOLID/Clean Architecture and rigorous code reviews, reducing critical defects by ~30%
Automated CI/CD with GitHub Actions and Docker; enforced unit/integration/E2E quality gates
Mentored junior developers and supported technical interviews
Leveraged GitHub Copilot and LLMs to accelerate coding, documentation, and review workflows

work.name: BRQ Digital Solutions
work.summary: Worked with a major US railway client, collaborating daily with international teams in English.
highlights: Built micro frontends and features from scratch; delivered fixes across other teams’ modules
Developed and maintained Spring Boot microservices with DB2

work.name: AgileThought (Client: Banco Santander)
work.summary: Debt renegotiation project for Banco Santander.
highlights: Implemented new features and bug fixes in an existing Angular codebase
Migrated legacy code to newer Angular versions
Contributed to a new frontend with updated visual patterns and a design system

work.name: Banco BV / ResourceIT
work.summary: Automotive insurance marketplace integrated into the vehicle financing flow.
highlights: Delivered features in a complex legacy AngularJS frontend; established coding/deployment guidelines
Evolved design system and created new projects
Implemented fixes and new features in legacy Java backends and Spring Boot microservices
Hardened security across frontend and backend

work.name: Olho no Carro
work.summary: Vehicle search features for consumers and enterprises; reporting module development.
highlights: Built and maintained Angular/NodeJS systems for internal parameterization and customer search
Created Excel ingestion scripts for MongoDB
Developed a NodeJS microservice for push notifications

work.name: INATEL
work.summary: Two client projects focusing on pixel-perfect UI and REST API backends; helped shape process and code review.
highlights: VMI (Security industry; widely used in Brazilian airports): Java/Spring Boot backend, Angular UI, PostgreSQL
PixelTI (IoT home automation hybrid app): NodeJS/Express backend, Angular/Ionic frontends, MongoDB

projects.name: Thyro Map
projects.description: Post‑thyroid exam report visualization tool; the doctor marks nodules on an image. Runs fully client‑side.

projects.name: Locker (Rock in Rio)
projects.description: Lost and found management for event participants using authorized totems.

projects.name: Administration of Minors (Rock in Rio)
projects.description: Registered minors search/management at event totems; supported operations during the festival.
